Class.ClassComment: AbstractExternalizer /** * Base class for {@link AdvancedExternalizer} implementations that offers defaultimplementations for some of its methods. In particular, this base class offers a default implementation for {@link org.infinispan.commons.marshall.AdvancedExternalizer#getId()}that returns null which is particularly useful for advanced externalizers whose id will be provided by XML or programmatic configuration rather than the externalizer implementation itself. * @author Galder Zamarre√±o * @since 5.0 */
